resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158318</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158318</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1893</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Guiness Book of records</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Guiness Buch der Sätze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le livre de Guiness des enregistrements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O livro de Guiness dos registros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il libro di Guiness dei record</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το βιβλίο Guiness των αρχείων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El libro de Guiness de expedientes</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for beginner English students, where the student learns about events which are strange but true, from The Guiness book of records and answers questions about them</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">presentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">records</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für englische 
Kursteilnehmer des Anfängers, in denen der Kursteilnehmer über 
Fälle erlernt, die sind, merkwürdig aber ausrichten, vom Guiness 
Buch der Sätze und beantwortet Fragen über sie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais de débutant, où l'étudiant se renseigne sur les 
événements qui sont étranges mais rectifient, du livre de Guiness 
des enregistrements et répond à des questions au sujet d'elles</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses do novato, onde o estudante aprende sobre os 
eventos que são estranhos mas rectificam, do livro de Guiness dos 
registros e responde a perguntas sobre elas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli 
allievi inglesi del principiante, in cui l'allievo impara circa gli 
eventi che sono sconosciuti ma allineare, dal libro di Guiness dei 
record e risponde loro le domande circa</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές αρχαρίων, όπου ο σπουδαστής μαθαίνει 
για τα γεγονότα που είναι παράξενα αλλά αληθινά, από το βιβλίο 
Guiness των αρχείων και των ερωτήσεων απαντήσεων για τα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses del principiante, donde el estudiante aprende 
sobre los acontecimientos que son extraños pero verdad, del libro de 
Guiness de expedientes y contesta a preguntas sobre ellas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sätze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enregistrements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresentação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">registros</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσίαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
